Core:Properties.Core:Property: "The document has been signed by Sumner and Selene.This Agreement is entered into on the twenty-fifth day of October, 1603. Sumner, the surrendering parent, and Selene, the custodial parent, hereby agree that from this date forward voluntarily and lawfully surrenders all parental rights and responsibilities to their Child, including but not limited to custody, decision-making authority, visitation rights, and access to education and medical information. The surrendering parent acknowledges that they shall have no contact with the Child unless explicitly agreed upon writing between all parties through the Church and that the custodial parent shall assume sole custody and shall have the exclusive authority to make all decisions regarding Child's upbringing, education, healthcare, and general welfare. For the benefit of the child, both parties agree to the confidentiality of this Agreement until the Child is of legal age. It bears the official seals of the Holy Roman Catholic Church and the Chief Justicar of the Kingdom of Italy. The document is signed by both parties, and is witnessed by Archbishop Roberto.\\n"
